room_title: Escape room "Spirits of the Asylum" by UNRAVELED Escape Room in Rochester (MN)
review: I had such a great time in the Spirits of the Asylum room with my parents, husband, and 11 and 8-year-old children! What an amazingly intricate and well-planned mystery! Can't believe we went right down to the wire but were able to finish at the 60-minute mark! Thanks for a fun adventure! Can't wait to try one if the other rooms the next time we visit!

room_title: Escape room "Spirits of the Asylum" by UNRAVELED Escape Room in Rochester (MN)
review: It was a Christmas gift from my in-law to do the Spirit of the Asylum room. We did it with 12 people and a 3-week-old baby and we loved it. There were enough different tasks in each space for everyone to stay involved. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Spirits of the Asylum" by UNRAVELED Escape Room in Rochester (MN)
review: Spirits of the Asylum was so fun! The puzzles were very intricate!

room_title: Escape room "Spirits of the Asylum" by UNRAVELED Escape Room in Rochester (MN)
review: My friends and I did the St Mary's challenge! Super fun, the game kept us on our toes the whole time! The riddles were challenging and awesome and I would highly recommend the game to everyone!

room_title: Escape room "Spirits of the Asylum" by UNRAVELED Escape Room in Rochester (MN)
review: We had so much fun! The room(s) were challenging, well themed, and so satisfying when we escaped! We did the Spirit of St. Mary's and it was a blast! I would definitely recommend it! Worth every penny!
